EmailTemplate.description: Includes link for ADVANCED PFQ and NO RAIT, NO NIP, NO eLearn No post work 2 reinf (Bring Workbook)
EmailTemplate.name: DRC Welcome Pack Adv PFQ (Bring Wkbk) + 2 Reinf
EmailTemplate.subject: Participant Information: ENS Program for {!Contact.Job_Account_Name__c} on {!Contact.Job_Certificate_Date__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName}
As part of the ENS International {!Contact.Program_Name__c} Program for {!Contact.Job_Account_Name__c} on {!Contact.Job_Certificate_Date__c}, please read the following information to help empower your negotiation success.
Date: {!Contact.Job_Certificate_Date__c} Time: {!Contact.Job_Start_Finish_Time__c} Venue:
{!Contact.Job_Venue_Name__c} {!Contact.Job_Venue_Address__c} {!Contact.Job_City_State_PC__c}
Program Leader/s: {!Contact.Job_Presenters__c} Dress: Smart casual
Don't forget to bring along your Negotiation and Influencing Workbook.
The ENS Program is not only about giving you the skills required to approach negotiations confidently but to also ensure that your learnings are sustained and become a force of habit. We believe that engaging you before and after the workshop will increase your learning outcomes and ask that you participate fully in the activities outlined below.
Pre-Program Requirements
Program Focus Questionnaire 'PFQ'- the PFQ helps the program leader to customise the program based on your needs. We ask that all PFQs are completed by {!Contact.Job_PFQ_Due_Date__c}. Click here to access the questionnaire. Note: This link is specific to you, please don't forward to others. Please ensure Java is enabled in your web browser. Please come briefed with notes on at least one current negotiation situation (for use in diagnosis and review sessions during the workshop).
Post Program Activity
You will receive 2 reinforcement emails sent fortnightly.
You have now been subscribed to our eBulletin Negotium (unless you have already registered online).
A full list of learning outcomes is available here.
We look forward to seeing you at the workshop!
Kind regards
{!Contact.Job_CSM_Name__c} Client Service Manager
Suite 507, 83 York Street Sydney NSW 2000 Australia p: +61 9299 9688 f: +61 9299 1633 www.negotiate.org
Note this email and any attachments may be privileged and confidential. If you are not the intended recipient please delete the message and notify the sender. Copying or distribution by anyone else is prohibited. Thank you.
